MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL14 postcode area of Rhosymedre, affecting properties in Queens Square, Church Street and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  09:32AM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:45PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:18AM on 7th November 2020
